newsitem.title: USA: First Merchants boosts qtrly dividend.
newsitem.headline: First Merchants boosts qtrly dividend.

text.p: First Merchants Corp said Tuesday it had increased by 20 percent its quarterly dividend to $0.24 per share.
First Merchants said the rise, payable September 20, represented a quarterly increase of $0.04 per share.
It said it had reported annual first-half earnings of $1.02 per share, 5.2 percent more than the $0.97 made during the same period in 1995.
First Merchants also said it had reached a definitive agreement to merge with Randolph County Bancorp from Winchester, IN sometime in the third quarter of 1996.
